title: The Cat, the Wolf and the Tap Dance Academy
description: Tall Tails the Half Grey Cat is a very lonely creature. But one day he decides that he will go become a teacher. He loves the arts and loves to dance and wants to spread that love to all the land. He gathers animals far and wide and gets them tapping all the time. But there is just one problem - the wolves are the only ones who aren't fond of Tails. They joke about him, laugh and bug him. They tell the meanest tales. But this is just the start, for Tails will do great things. The wolf will do great things as well, far greater than you think. Friendships will grow and talents will spark a new place for the arts to stay. Surprises will occur and lives will be saved. Our story starts now so find a comfortable spot to sit and laugh and smile. Gather your loved ones and enter a world where music, dancing and magic are in style.
author: Thomas Winters
